data.quote: If we are not free, no one will respect us.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: One of the very important characteristics of a student is to question. Let the students ask questions.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: To become unique, the challenge is to fight the hardest battle which anyone can imagine until you reach your destination.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
